Package tdi :: Module util :: Class Deprecator
[frames] | no frames]

Class Deprecator

source code

object --+
         |
        Deprecator
Known Subclasses:
  • CallableDeprecator

Deprecation proxy class

The class basically emits a deprecation warning on access.
